channel.title: Sass on Book
channel.description: Recent content in Sass on Book

item.title: Formating
item.description: Formating En sass existen dos tipos de archivos. sass y scss. En sass se usara la identacion muy parecido YAML, para definir los style shets. mientras que en scss se usara la syntaxis de css para definir los estilos.

item.title: install
item.description: Install Install Anywhere (npm) If you use Node.js, you can also install Sass using npm by running npm install -g sass However, please note that this will install the pure JavaScript implementation of Sass, which runs somewhat slower than the other options listed here. But it has the same interface, so itâ€™ll be easy to swap in another implementation later if you need a bit more speed! Install on Windows (Chocolatey)
